title: Stadion Hadzhi Dimitar
text:
Stadion Hadzhi Dimitar () is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Sliven">Sliven</a>, <a href="Bulgaria">Bulgaria</a>. It is currently used for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="OFC%20Sliven%202000">OFC Sliven 2000</a>. The stadium holds 10,000 people.
In 2008, due to the promotion of <a href="OFC%20Sliven%202000">OFC Sliven 2000</a> in the <a href="Bulgarian%20A%20PFG">A PFG</a>, plastic seats were installed in the stands of the stadium.
In 2009, the mayor of <a href="Sliven">Sliven</a>, <a href="Yordan%20Letchkov">Yordan Letchkov</a>, announced that he plans also to install electric lighting to the stadium, right before the start of the new football campaign.
